example.parse: (CONJ و) (S (NP-SBJ (PRON_3MS هو)) (SBAR-NOM-PRD (WHNP-2 (REL_PRON الذي)) (S (VP (PV+PVSUFF_SUBJ:3MS كان) (VP (IV3MS+IV+IVSUFF_MOOD:I يحدد) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-2)) (PP-CLR (PREP ل) (NP (DET+NOUN+NSUFF_MASC_PL_GEN لمتطوعين))) (NP-OBJ (NP (DET+NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_PL+CASE_DEF_ACC المهمات)) (SBAR (WHNP-3 (REL_PRON التي)) (S (VP (PRT (FUT_PART س)) (IV3MP+IV+IVSUFF_SUBJ:MP_MOOD:I يقومون) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *)) (PP-CLR (PREP ب) (NP (NP (PRON_3FS ها)) (NP (-NONE- *T*-3)))) (PP-LOC (PREP في) (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN الخارج)))))))))))) (PUNC .))

arg.g: the missions they will carry out overseas

example.arg: المهمات التي سيقومون بها في الخارج
